file.title: AMM PART II-1285 - CHAPTER 05-40-08-06 - EWIS COMPONENTS IN THE REAR FUSELAGE II AFT AREA OF REAR PRESSURE BULKHEAD - INSPECTION/CHECK

page.data: AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL EWIS COMPONENTS IN THE REAR FUSELAGE II AFT AREA OF REAR PRESSURE BULKHEAD - INSPECTION/CHECK EFFECTIVITY: ALL 1. General A. This section gives the procedures to do the visual inspection of the EWIS components in the rear fuselage II, aft area of rear pressure bulkhead, for general condition. B. Related Zones: 311/312. C. Zone Boundaries ( AMM MPP 06-41-00/100 AMM MPP 06-41-00/100). D. The procedures in this section are given in the sequence below. The tasks identified with ( ♦) are part of the Scheduled Maintenance Requirements Document (SMRD). TASK NUMBER DESCRIPTION EFFECTIVITY EWIS COMPONENTS IN THE REAR FU- SELAGE II (AFT AREA OF REAR PRES- ALL 05-40-08-200-801-A ♦ SURE BULKHEAD) - INTERNAL GENERAL VISUAL INSPECTION EMB-145 - AMM 1285 General 05-40-08 Page 1 of 4 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 05-40-08-200-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 2. EWIS COMPONENTS IN THE REAR FUSELAGE II (AFT AREA OF REAR PRESSURE BULKHEAD) - INTERNAL GENERAL VISUAL INSPECTION A. General (1) This procedure obeys the EWIS ICA requirement. (2) This task gives the instructions to do SMRD Task Number: 20-00-00-212-008-A00. (3) You must do the internal general visual inspection (GVI) of rear fuselage II, at the aft area of rear pressure bulkhead, at zones 311/312, within a touching distance of the power cables and wiring bundles. (4) The function of the internal general visual inspection (GVI) is to find damage, failure, or irregular conditions that can be easily seen. (5) Do not unlace or displace the electrical wirings and components during the inspections. (6) Refer to the Preparation subtask for access panel information. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM MPP 06-42-00/100 - WM 20-22-00 - C. Zones and Accesses ZONE PANEL/DOOR LOCATION Rear fuselage II - aft area of rear pres- 312 312AR sure bulkhead - RH D. Tools and Equipment ITEM DESCRIPTION PURPOSE QTY Standard Flashlight To make the inspection of the area easier Standard Ladder To get access to the area E. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable EMB-145 - AMM 1285 200-801-A/600 05-40-08 Page 2 of 4 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE Rear fuselage II - aft area of rear pressure 1 Does the task bulkhead - RH I. Preparation SUBTASK 841-002-A (1) Put the ladder in position. (2) Open access door 312AR (AMM MPP 06-42-00/100) to get access to the rear pressure bulkhead, in the non-pressurized area side. J. EWIS Components in the Rear Fuselage II (Aft Area of Rear Pressure Bulkhead) - Internal General Visual Inspection (Figure 601) SUBTASK 212-002-A (1) Do a general visual inspection on the power cables, wiring bundles, and connected EWIS at Rear Fuselage II, aft area of Rear Pressure Bulkhead, for signs of damage, adequate installation, chafing and general condition. Refer to WM 20-22-00. K. Follow-on SUBTASK 842-002-A (1) Install access door 312AR (AMM MPP 06-42-00/100). (2) Remove the ladder.
